mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST_REPT PR LEFT JOIN AD_POST_REPT APR ON PR.POST_REPT_CD = APR.POST_REPT_CD WHERE APR.AD_POST_REPT_CD IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CMNT_REPT CR LEFT JOIN AD_CMNT_REPT ACR ON CR.CMNT_REPT_CD = ACR.CMNT_REPT_CD WHERE ACR.AD_CMNT_REPT_CD IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA Q LEFT JOIN AD_ANSR AA ON Q.QNA_CD = AA.QNA_CD WHERE AA.AD_ANSR_CD IS NULL

SELECT UI.USER_DSTN_CD AS USER_DSTN_CD , UI.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME , UI.USER_ID AS USER_ID , PB.POST_BAN_DATE AS BAN_DATE FROM POST_BAN PB JOIN USER_INFO UI ON PB.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID UNION SELECT UI.USER_DSTN_CD AS USER_DSTN_CD , UI.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME , UI.USER_ID AS USER_ID , CB.CMNT_BAN_DATE AS BAN_DATE FROM CMNT_BAN CB JOIN USER_INFO UI ON CB.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID ORDER BY BAN_DATE DESC

SELECT P.POST_CD AS POST_CD , P.OPINION AS OPINION , FN_REPT_CATE(PR.REPT_CATE_CD) AS REPT_CATE , PR.POST_REPT_DATE AS POST_REPT_DATE , NVL(FN_CNFM(APR.CNFM_CD), '-') AS CNFM_RESULT FROM POST P JOIN POST_REPT PR ON P.POST_CD = PR.POST_CD LEFT JOIN AD_POST_REPT APR ON PR.POST_REPT_CD = APR.POST_REPT_CD ORDER BY CNFM_RESULT, POST_REPT_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST_REPT PR LEFT JOIN AD_POST_REPT APR ON PR.POST_REPT_CD = APR.POST_REPT_CD WHERE APR.AD_POST_REPT_CD IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CMNT_REPT CR LEFT JOIN AD_CMNT_REPT ACR ON CR.CMNT_REPT_CD = ACR.CMNT_REPT_CD WHERE ACR.AD_CMNT_REPT_CD IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA Q LEFT JOIN AD_ANSR AA ON Q.QNA_CD = AA.QNA_CD WHERE AA.AD_ANSR_CD IS NULL
SELECT NOTI_CD, NOTI_TITLE, NOTI_DATE FROM NOTI WHERE NOTI_PIN LIKE 'Y' ORDER BY NOTI_PIN DESC, NOTI_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_INFO WHERE TO_CHAR(USER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LEAVE_INFO WHERE TO_CHAR(LEAVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST WHERE TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POST P LEFT JOIN POST_REPT PR ON P.POST_CD = PR.POST_CD WHERE PR.POST_REPT_CD IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CMNT C LEFT JOIN CMNT_REPT CR ON C.CMNT_CD = CR.CMNT_CD WHERE CR.CMNT_REPT_CD IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_INFO WHERE TO_CHAR(USER_DATE, 'YYYY')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND TO_CHAR(USER_DATE, 'MM')=#{month}
